archimate:Requirement.name: 4.60.4 FIAM Requirements control
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Where Federated Identity and Access Management (FIAM) is used, arrangements should be made to ensure it: builds upon the organisation's exist-ing IAM arrangements is subject to separate governance, planning, risk assessment, review and monitoring takes into account the needs of FIAM partners (i.e. those organisations with which FIAM connections will be established) makes use of only agreed FIAM pro-tocols (e.g. SAML, OpenID, WS-Trust and WS-Federation) uses approved FIAM connection software f) is supplemented with multi-factor authentication when it relates to privileged access or any access to con-fidential data.
